price: Мо Мӯсоро бо муъҷизоти худ ва далели қотеъ фиристодем
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
